parameters.definition: Number of different machines or stations
Time to produce one unit of product k on station s
Total available time on station s
Profit from producing one unit of product k

description: Determine the quantities to be produced such that all the production constraints are satisfied and the profit is maximized. The parameters include the number of different products \param{K} and the number of different machines or stations \param{S}. Each product k requires \param{ProduceTime} to produce on station s. Each station s has a total available time of \param{AvailableTime}. The profit from producing one unit of product k is \param{Profit}.
